fullplot: A Polish man who returns home after the death of his father unearths a secret about the now-deceased Jewish residents of his village.
plot: A Polish man who returns home after the death of his father unearths a secret about the now-deceased Jewish residents of his village.
title: Aftermath

tomatoes.consensus: It represents an occasionally uneven collision of genres, but all in all, Wladyslaw Pasikowski's Aftermath delves into Holocaust guilt with power and efficiency.
